mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, o.order_code AS orderCode, o.total_price AS totalPrice, o.discount_price AS discountPrice, o.order_status AS orderStatus, o.payment_method AS paymentMethod, ui.name AS userName, ui.tel AS userPhone, a.road_num AS userAddress, a.address AS userAddressDetail FROM Orders o JOIN User u ON o.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN UserInfo ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN Address a ON ui.user_info = a.user_info WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Orders (created_at, updated_at, order_code, total_price, discount_price, is_cancelled, delivery_id, guest_id, user_id, order_status, payment_method) VALUES ( #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{orderCode}, #{totalPrice}, #{discountPrice}, #{isCancelled}, #{deliveryId}, #{guestId}, #{userId}, #{orderStatus}, #{paymentMethod})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
